StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the COSMO reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: CosmoFormat
IntVectorProperty.label: Cosmo Format
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, the data will be read as the LANL Cosmo format. If unchecked, the data will be read as Gadget-2 format.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RL
DoubleVectorProperty.label: rL (physical box side length)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The box side length used to wrap particles around if they exceed rL (or less than 0) in any dimension.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Overlap
DoubleVectorProperty.label: overlap (shared point/ghost cell gap distance)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The space in rL units to extend processor particle ownership for ghost particles/cells. Needed for correct halo calculation when halos cross processor boundaries in parallel computation.

FileSeriesReaderProxy.name: CosmoReader
FileSeriesReaderProxy.label: COSMO Reader

Documentation.long_help: Read a cosmology file into a vtkUnstructuredGrid.

FileSeriesReaderProxy.Documentation: The Cosmology reader reads a binary file of particle location, velocity, and id creating a vtkUnstructuredGrid. The default file extension is .cosmo. Reads LANL Cosmo format or Gadget format.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader.

IntVectorProperty.name: CopyHaloDataToParticles
IntVectorProperty.label: Copy halo information to original particles
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If checked, halo data will be copied to the original particles. If unchecked, the particles will not be annotated with halo data.

IntVectorProperty.name: NP
IntVectorProperty.label: np (number of seeded particles in one dimension)
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Number of seeded particles in one dimension. Therefore, total simulation particles is np^3 (cubed).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RL
DoubleVectorProperty.label: rL (physical box side length)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The box side length used to wrap particles around if they exceed rL (or less than 0) in any dimension.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Overlap
DoubleVectorProperty.label: overlap (shared point/ghost cell gap distance)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The space in rL units to extend processor particle ownership for ghost particles/cells. Needed for correct halo calculation when halos cross processor boundaries in parallel computation.

IntVectorProperty.name: PMin
IntVectorProperty.label: pmin (minimum particles for a halo)
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Minimal number of particles needed before a group is called a halo.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BB
DoubleVectorProperty.label: bb (linking distance)
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Linking length measured in units of interparticle spacing and is dimensionless. Used to link particles into halos for the friend-of-a-friend algorithm.
